description: This Python source file defines a FastAPI router for handling content-related endpoints with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). It includes endpoints for listing, creating, and deleting content items, each protected by specific role requirements.

methods.name: list_content
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list content items with RBAC enforced, returning a static list of content.

methods.name: create_content
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new content item, echoing the payload with a fake ID, protected by WRITE_ROLES.

methods.name: delete_content
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a content item by ID, requiring ADMIN_ROLES.
